item.title: Stock Futures Tumble on China AI Advances
item.description: Stock indexes sank, led by the Nasdaq, amid a competitive threat from Chinese artificial-intelligence upstart DeepSeek.

item.title: Gold Futures Fall as U.S. Federal Reserve Expected to Keep Rates Steady
item.description: Gold futures declined on waning U.S. interest rate cut optimism and also reflecting reignited tariff concerns, which are typically a tailwind for the ...

item.title: Natural Gas Falls on Shifting Weather Forecasts
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures fell after weekend updates took some of the chill out of early February weather forecasts.

item.title: Building-Products Distributor QXO Launches Hostile Bid for Beacon
item.description: QXO is taking its offer directly to shareholders after being rebuffed on several occasions.
